required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Suxiao Jiuxin Pills in Microvascular Obstruction in Patients With Acute Coronary Syndrome
clinical_study.official_title: Suxiao Jiuxin Pills in Microvascular Obstruction in Patients With Acute Coronary Syndrome

lead_sponsor.agency: Guangzhou University of Traditional Chinese Medicine

clinical_study.source: Guangzhou University of Traditional Chinese Medicine

brief_summary.textblock: Microvascular obstruction is the severe complication of percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI) in patients with acute coronary syndrome. Microvascular obstruction after PCI is often association with poor prognosis. Current treatments do not show improvement in prognosis of microvascular obstruction. Suxiao Jiuxin Pills (SXJX) was shown associated with a reduction in MACE, and an improvement of heart function and quality of life in acute coronary syndrome (ACS) patients with early PCI. To evaluate the effectiveness and safety of SXJX in microvascular obstruction after PCI, the investigators designed this study.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline myocardial infarct size at 6 months
Change from baseline incidence of microvascular obstruction at 6 months
primary_outcome.description: Incidence of Microvascular obstruction measure by CMR

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline incidence of intramyocardial hemorrhagex at 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence of intramyocardial hemorrhagex measure by CMR

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline incidence of area-at-risk at 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence of area-at-risk measure by CMR

secondary_outcome.measure: Change of ST segment in electrocardiogram
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, immediately after PCI, 5-7 days after PCI, 30±7 days and 180±7 days
secondary_outcome.description: Change of ST segment in electrocardiogram

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, immediately after PCI, 5-7 days after PCI, and 180±7 days
Baseline, immediately after PCI, 5-7 days after PCI, and 180±7 days
Baseline, immediately after PCI, 5-7 days after PCI, and 180±7 days

secondary_outcome.measure: Change of ejection fraction in echocardiography
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 3-5 days after PCI and 180±7 days
3-5 days after PCI, 30±7 days and 180±7 days
secondary_outcome.description: 6MWT is used to assess aerobic capacity and endurance

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: Cardiac death, myocardial infarction, stent thrombosis, stroke or transient ischemic attack, urgent revascularization and re-hospitalization for heart failure
Cardiac shock, heart failure, mechanical complications and arrhythmia

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 1 year
baseline, 3-5 days after PCI, 30±7 days, 90±7 days and 180±7 days
secondary_outcome.description: Seattle Angina Questionnaire (SAQ), the scale has 19 questions, value of each question is from 1 to 6, higher scores mean a better outcome.

arm_group.description: Suxiao Jiuxin Pills prescription (15 pills loading does, maintenance 6 pills each time, three times a day.) for 180 days

arm_group.arm_group_label: The placebo of Suxiao Jiuxin Pills
arm_group.description: The placebo of Suxiao Jiuxin Pills prescription (15 pills loading does, maintenance 6 pills each time, three times a day.) for 180 days

intervention.description: Suxiao Jiuxin Pills consists Rhizoma Ligustici (Chuan xiong) and Borneolum (Bing pian).

intervention.intervention_name: The placebo of Suxiao Jiuxin Pills
intervention.description: The placebo of Suxiao Jiuxin Pills is similar to Suxiao Jiuxin Pills in appearance, smell, and taste.
intervention.arm_group_label: The placebo of Suxiao Jiuxin Pills
